@NANI ?!

At the risk of being accused of defending their opinion, I'd say a story in porn makes it better. It exists even in NTR on works like Nagare Ippon, ShindoL, MTSP(Jin), Takeda Hiromitsu and so on. I'd even wager that NTR needs it most as you have to establish a bond that is strong before you break it. An example of this is Nagare Ippon's Boku no Shiranai Kanojo no Kao where the author establishes the bond by continuously showing the guy's earnest efforts side by side her corruption and by the end, both are broken. Again, I'm not here to defend people complaining about NTR but I'm defending story points being deemed unnecessary. Stories can work and the artists who have the mettle are remembered by people. I'd even wager that as a reason why hentai artists sometimes draw on official weekly mangas. So don't discount story as part of hentai mangas. They work, even if they're NTR.
